name: Doritos Dodgeball Challenge
description:
Working with our friends at unit9 we developed and helped to refine the Flash front end for this amazing project.

Via a live video feed users are able to take control of one of 8 ball firing cannons and click to shoot at the dodgeball teams.

Queuing and booking systems help to ensure everyone gets a go, and a live video feed of the event with multiple camera angles keeps you entertained while you wait.

Make sure to check the programme for various celebrity appearances!
